===JQuery Fancy Box Plugin as Wicket behavior example===

*[http://fancybox.net Original javascript version can be found here]*


*Prerequisites:* Your wicket application is configured to use JQWicket as described in the [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket "Quick Start"] guide.

*Description:* This example demonstrates how to integrate JQuery Fancybox Plugin with the wicket components using JQWicket.

*Single image with Fancybox*

*Java-Code:*
{{{
add(new FancyBoxWebMarkupContainer("example", 
      new FancyBoxOptions()
            .opacity(true)
            .overlayShow(false)
            .transitionIn("elastic")
            .transitionOut("none")
));
}}}

*Html-Template:*
{{{
<a wicket:id="example" href="_images/someimage_big.jpg">
  <img alt="example" src="_images/fancybox/someimage_small.jpg" />
</a>
}}}


*Image gallery with Fancybox*

*Java-Code:*
{{{
add(new GenericFancyBoxBehavior("a[rel=example_group]",
      new FancyBoxOptions()
            .transitionIn("none")
            .transitionOut("none")
            .titlePosition("over")
            .titleFormat(
               "return '<span id=\"fancybox-title-over\">" +
               "Image ' + (currentIndex + 1) + ' / ' + " + 
               "currentArray.length + (title.length ? ' &nbsp; ' "+ 
               "+ title : '')" + 
               " + '</span>';"
             )
));

}}}

*Html-Template:*
{{{
<p>
  Image gallery<br />
  <a rel="example_group" href="_images/fancybox/9_b.jpg" title="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet">
    <img alt="" src="_images/fancybox/9_s.jpg" />
  </a>
  <a rel="example_group" href="_images/fancybox/10_b.jpg" title="">
    <img alt="" src="_images/fancybox/10_s.jpg" />
  </a>
  <a rel="example_group" href="_images/fancybox/11_b.jpg" title="">
    <img alt="" src="_images/fancybox/11_s.jpg" />
  </a>
  <a rel="example_group" href="_images/fancybox/12_b.jpg" title="">
    <img class="last" alt="" src="_images/fancybox/12_s.jpg" />
  </a>
</p>
}}}
